experience: You and Ben both know Eric Keosky-Smith, Anila Arthanari, and 31 others

At Infusionsoft, we help small businesses succeed.  We wholeheartedly believe that when our customers are successful, we are successful.  The Direct Sales department is fortunate to be on the front lines of that mission, creating powerful relationships with our customers the moment they engage with us.  As the Director of Sales at Infusionsoft, my primary focus is to create an environment that empowers talented sales professionals to create an exciting career through the success of our customers.  We love the passion of the small business entrepreneur and understand that creating a small business sales and marketing engine is their top priority to drive revenues.  We match their hurried pace stride for stride as we appreciate the time constraints of our small business owners.  When we focus on creating a high-performance, high-integrity environment that keeps the customers at the forefront of every decision we make, it makes exceeding both our revenue and new customer acquisition goals an outcome we can be proud of.

•	Managing the DAILY inputs/KPI’s of the Direct Sales Team•         Attainment of the following department monthly, quarterly, and annual goals:o   New Customer Acquisitiono   Recurring Revenueo   Service Revenue•	Managing the DAILY inputs/KPI’s of the Direct Sales Team•	Meeting with Sales Managers for personal/professional development•	Managing budget and operating plan creation for Direct Sales •	Nurturing career development and goal setting for sales reps•	Inspiring the team through care with a demonstrated history of strong leadership skills•	Partnering with key stakeholders throughout the company to drive innovation•	Representing Direct Sales organization •	Contributing to overall team improvements through thought-leadership and positive participation with department leaders and with your team

•         Attainment of the following department monthly, quarterly, and annual goals:o   New Customer Acquisitiono   Recurring Revenueo   Service Revenueo   Opportunity Pipeline Mgmt.•         Motivate team to attain and exceed performance targets•         Drive Excellence in CRM and Technology usage•         Provide hands-on TruSelling training and skill development of representatives on your team •         Join sales representatives on sales calls to assist in closing deals•         Handle escalations, as required•         Contribute to overall team improvements through thought-leadership and positive participation with department leaders and with your team•         Nurture the career development and goal setting for each team member•         Ensure coordination of essential training and educational events for sales representatives•         Partner with key stakeholders throughout the organization to drive needed change

• Directly interact with prospects to position the value of Infusionsoft's solutions and services as supported by applying Infusionsoft's TruSelling Methodology (buy/sell alignment, business case development, case studies and a passion for helping small businesses)• Prospect new companies as potential customers/partners of Infusionsoft's solutions utilizing Infusionsoft's marketing team.• Pursue professional and personal development to ensure adequate knowledge of the business markets and industries Infusionsoft serves, as well as the products and services Infusionsoft provides.• Update on a timely basis Infusionsoft's CRM system with accurate customer and pipeline information.

December 18, 2015, Christine managed Ben directly

“Considerate, driven, and wise” is the phrase I would use to characterize Ben.  As a senior sales leader, these traits have been the key to Ben’s long-standing success at Infusionsoft.  His ability to intelligently assess a situation, create solutions to solve tough problems, while taking the necessary change management challenges into account, is a rarity in any sales organization.  Ben gives thoughtful, comprehensive coaching and creates an environment where the vision of the organization is understood by all those he leads.  His teams are held to the highest standard and are determined to meet their goals because of the pride and professionalism he infuses into the organization.  He is a key contributor in our company and comes with my highest recommendation as any organization would benefit greatly from adding Ben to their leadership team.

Here to help Those I can, and to learn from those I can't.
November 14, 2013, Ben worked with Glenn in the same group

Ben and I were part of the same sales team while I was at Infusionsoft. Ben was always very happy to help out colleagues and answer questions from newer sales staff.  Ben's work ethic and consistency exemplified what Infusionsoft is all about.  Ben works hard to master the sales process and is patient, dedicated, and knowledgeable, always putting the prospects and client's needs ahead of his. Ben was always at the top of the sales board in no small part to his mastery of the consultative sales model.  Ben is very deserving of his new role at Infusionsoft, and I can honestly say that I am sorry I did not get the chance to work under him while I was there.  I think he will be a terrific Sales Manager, and I am sure that he will continue to climb the leadership ladder at Infusionsoft or elsewhere.
